Token.Abstract: Provides a static method API for conveniently accessing fixture data contained within a designated NSBundle. Useful when writing unit tests that leverage fixture data for testing parsing and object mapping operations.
Returns the NSBundle object designated as the source location for unit testing fixture data.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSBundle object designated as the source location for unit testing fixture data or nil if none has been configured.

Token.Abstract: Designates the specified NSBundle object as the source location for unit testing fixture data.
Returns the full path to the specified fixture file on within the fixture bundle.

Parameter.Name: fixtureName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the fixture file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The full path to the specified fixture file or nil if it cannot be located.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a string object by reading data from the fixture identified by the specified file name using UTF-8 encoding.

Parameter.Name: fixtureName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the fixture file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string created by reading data from the specified fixture file using the NSUTF8StringEncoding.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a data object by reading every byte from the fixture identified by the specified file name.

Parameter.Name: fixtureName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the resource file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A data object by reading every byte from the fixture file.

Token.Abstract: Returns the MIME Type for the fixture identified by the specified name.

Parameter.Name: fixtureName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the fixture file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The MIME Type for the resource file or nil if the file could not be located.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an object representation of the data from the fixture identified by the specified file name by reading the data as a string and parsing it using a parser appropriate for the MIME Type of the file.

Parameter.Name: fixtureName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the resource file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new image object for the specified file, or nil if the method could not initialize the image from the specified file.
